00020 //! wrapper for accessing external functions defined in ATLAS, LAPACK or BLAS libraries
00021 class auxlib
00022   {
00023   public:
00024   
00025   template<typename eT>
00026   inline static const eT& tmp_real(const eT& X)              { return X; }
00027   
00028   template<typename T>
00029   inline static const T&  tmp_real(const std::complex<T>& X) { return X.real(); }
00030 
00031
